title: Center-preserving irreducible representations of finite groups
summary: Given finite groups $H \leq G$, a representation $σ$ of $G$ is called center-preserving on $H$ if the only elements of $H$ that become central under $σ$ are those that were already central in $G$. We prove that if $H$ has a faithful irreducible representation $ρ$, then at least one of the irreducible components of the induction $\operatorname{Ind}_H^G(ρ)$ is center-preserving on $H$. In consequence, $H$ has a faithful irreducible representation if and only if every finite group $G$ containing $H$ as a subgroup has an irreducible representation whose restriction to $H$ is faithful, and which is center-preserving on $H$. In addition, we give examples illustrating the sharpness of the statement, and discuss the connection with projective representations.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了：如果有限群H有一个忠实不可约表示ρ，那么诱导表示Ind_H^G(ρ)的至少一个不可约分量在H上是中心保持的。由此得出H有忠实不可约表示当且仅当每个包含H的有限群G都有一个不可约表示，其在H上的限制是忠实的且在H上是中心保持的。
AI.motivation: 研究有限群表示理论中的中心保持性质，探讨忠实不可约表示的存在性与诱导表示性质之间的关系，为群表示理论提供新的结构洞察。
AI.method: 使用群表示理论方法，特别是诱导表示技术，分析中心保持表示的性质。通过数学证明建立主要定理，并构造示例说明结果的尖锐性。
AI.result: 证明了如果H有忠实不可约表示ρ，那么诱导表示Ind_H^G(ρ)至少有一个不可约分量在H上是中心保持的。建立了H有忠实不可约表示的充要条件。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了忠实不可约表示存在性与中心保持性质之间的深刻联系，为群表示理论提供了新的工具和视角，并讨论了与射影表示的联系。

title: The Pieri Rule at Infinity
summary: We study the structure of tensor products of $\mathfrak{gl}(\infty) = \varinjlim \mathfrak{gl}(n)$-modules $\mathbf L(\mathbf λ) \otimes \mathbf F$ where $\mathbf L(\mathbf λ)$ is a simple integrable highest weight module and $\mathbf F$ is a simple integrable weight multiplicity-free module. Both $\mathbf L(\mathbf λ)$ and $\mathbf F$ are infinite dimensional, in particular $\mathbf F$ can be a Fock module. Similar tensor products of $\mathfrak{gl}(n)$-modules are semisimple and their simple constituents are described by the classical Pieri rule. We prove that a $\mathfrak{gl}(\infty)$-module $\mathbf M:= \mathbf L(\mathbf λ) \otimes \mathbf F$ is semisimple only in relatively trivial cases, and is indecomposable otherwise. Our main results are a description of the simple constituents of $\mathbf M$, and the construction of a linkage filtration on $\mathbf M$ that provides information on when two simple constituents of $\mathbf M$ are linked. Using the linkage filtration, we compute the socle and radical filtrations of $\mathbf M$, and determine when $\mathbf M$ is rigid.

AI.tldr: 研究𝔤𝔩(∞)-模𝐋(𝛌)⊗𝐅的张量积结构，其中𝐋(𝛌)是单可积最高权模，𝐅是单可积权重重数自由模。与有限维情况不同，这种无限维张量积通常不可分解，仅在相对平凡情况下半单。
AI.motivation: 研究无限维李代数𝔤𝔩(∞)的模张量积结构。有限维𝔤𝔩(n)的类似张量积是半单的，其单分量由经典Pieri规则描述。但对于无限维情况，需要理解其结构何时半单、何时不可分解，以及如何描述其单分量和链接关系。
AI.method: 通过构造链接滤过(linkage filtration)来分析张量积𝐌=𝐋(𝛌)⊗𝐅的结构。该滤过提供了关于𝐌中两个单分量何时链接的信息。基于此滤过，计算𝐌的socle和根滤过，并确定𝐌何时是刚性的。
AI.result: 证明了𝔤𝔩(∞)-模𝐌=𝐋(𝛌)⊗𝐅仅在相对平凡情况下是半单的，否则是不可分解的。描述了𝐌的单分量，并构造了链接滤过来分析分量间的链接关系。利用链接滤过计算了𝐌的socle和根滤过，确定了𝐌何时是刚性的。
AI.conclusion: 无限维𝔤𝔩(∞)-模的张量积结构与有限维情况有本质不同：通常不可分解而非半单。链接滤过是分析这种结构的有力工具，能够描述单分量间的链接关系，并计算相关的滤过结构。这为理解无限维李代数的表示理论提供了重要进展。

title: A note on the $m$-extended module categories of Nakayama algebras
summary:
We study the extended module category $m\operatorname{-mod}Λ$ of an algebra $Λ$, recently introduced by Gupta and Zhou. The existence of a postprojective component of $m\operatorname{-mod}Λ$ is shown for certain algebras $Λ$, and a knitting algorithm through cohomological dimension vectors is provided.
  In particular, the extended module category of Nakayama algebras with homogeneous relations are investigated, and it is classified when they are of finite type. The paper give fully calculated AR-quivers for several Nakayama algebras.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了代数Λ的扩展模范畴m-modΛ，证明了某些代数存在后投射分量，提供了通过上同调维数向量的编织算法，特别研究了具有齐次关系的Nakayama代数的扩展模范畴，并分类了有限型情况，给出了多个Nakayama代数的AR-quiver计算。
AI.motivation: 研究Gupta和Zhou最近引入的代数Λ的扩展模范畴m-modΛ，探索其结构和性质，特别关注Nakayama代数的情况。
AI.method: 使用上同调维数向量的编织算法，分析扩展模范畴的后投射分量，特别研究具有齐次关系的Nakayama代数，计算其AR-quiver。
AI.result: 证明了某些代数Λ的扩展模范畴m-modΛ存在后投射分量，提供了编织算法，分类了具有齐次关系的Nakayama代数扩展模范畴的有限型情况，并给出了多个具体代数的AR-quiver完整计算。
AI.conclusion: 扩展模范畴m-modΛ具有丰富的结构性质，对于某些代数存在后投射分量，通过编织算法可以系统研究，特别对于Nakayama代数，可以完全分类其有限型情况并计算AR-quiver。

title: Casselman-Wallach property for homological theta lifting
summary: In this paper, we establish the Casselman-Wallach property for homological theta lifting over archimedean local fields. As a consequence, the Euler-Poincaré characteristic is a well-defined element in the Grothendieck group of Casselman-Wallach representations. Our main tool is a corank-one parabolic stable filtration on the Weil representation.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了在阿基米德局部域上同调theta提升的Casselman-Wallach性质，从而Euler-Poincaré特征在Casselman-Wallach表示的Grothendieck群中成为良定义元素。
AI.motivation: 研究同调theta提升在阿基米德局部域上的表示论性质，特别是建立其与Casselman-Wallach表示理论的关系，为相关表示论问题提供理论框架。
AI.method: 主要工具是Weil表示上的余秩一抛物稳定滤过，通过这种滤过结构来分析同调theta提升的表示性质。
AI.result: 证明了同调theta提升具有Casselman-Wallach性质，从而Euler-Poincaré特征在Casselman-Wallach表示的Grothendieck群中成为良定义元素。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了同调theta提升与Casselman-Wallach表示理论之间的重要联系，为相关表示论研究提供了新的工具和视角。

title: A lifting theorem for Grothendieck-Verdier categories
summary:
We identify additional structure on a conservative lax monoidal functor from a closed monoidal category $\mathcal{C}$ to a Grothendieck-Verdier category $\mathcal{D}$, such that the Grothendieck-Verdier structure of $\mathcal{D}$ lifts to $\mathcal{C}$ and the functor becomes Frobenius linearly distributive. As an application, we recover and extend conditions under which modules over Hopf monads and Hopf algebroids inherit Grothendieck-Verdier structures. We also characterize when categories of bimodules, modules, and local modules over (commutative) algebras internal to a Grothendieck-Verdier category admit such structures. Our results apply to quantales, smash product algebras, skew group algebras, and enveloping algebras of Lie-Rinehart algebras.
  For applications of the lifting theorem, we construct a strict $2$-equivalence between a $2$-category of Grothendieck-Verdier categories and one of linearly distributive categories with negation, and extend this $2$-equivalence to the braided setting.

AI.tldr: 论文研究了如何将Grothendieck-Verdier结构从目标范畴提升到源范畴，使得保守的lax幺半函子成为Frobenius线性分配函子，并应用于Hopf monads、Hopf algebroids等代数结构的模范畴。
AI.motivation: 研究如何在保守的lax幺半函子上添加额外结构，使得Grothendieck-Verdier范畴的结构能够提升到源范畴，从而扩展该结构在各种代数构造中的应用范围。
AI.method: 识别保守lax幺半函子的额外结构条件，建立提升定理，构造Grothendieck-Verdier范畴与带否定的线性分配范畴之间的严格2-等价，并将其扩展到辫子设置。
AI.result: 成功建立了提升定理，恢复了Hopf monads和Hopf algebroids模范畴继承Grothendieck-Verdier结构的条件，并刻画了Grothendieck-Verdier范畴内(交换)代数的双模、模和局部模范畴的相应结构。
AI.conclusion: 该理论框架具有广泛适用性，可应用于quantales、smash积代数、斜群代数、Lie-Rinehart代数的包络代数等多种代数结构，为相关范畴结构的研究提供了统一工具。

title: Weyl elements in isotropic reductive groups
summary: We study Weyl elements in isotropic reductive groups over commutative rings. Our main result in an explicit formula for squares of such elements.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了交换环上各向同性约化群中的Weyl元素，主要结果是给出了这类元素平方的显式公式。
AI.motivation: 研究交换环上各向同性约化群中Weyl元素的性质，特别是它们的平方运算，这对于理解这类代数结构的表示理论和几何性质具有重要意义。
AI.method: 通过代数群理论的方法，在交换环的背景下研究各向同性约化群，推导Weyl元素的平方公式。
AI.result: 获得了Weyl元素平方的显式公式，这是本文的主要结果。
AI.conclusion: 成功推导出了交换环上各向同性约化群中Weyl元素平方的显式公式，为相关代数结构的研究提供了新的工具和视角。

title: On geometric models in representation theory
comment: Proceedings of the ICM 2026, more references in the arXiv version
summary: Geometric models have emerged as an important tool in the representation theory of algebras. Surface models associated to gentle algebras have been particularly fruitful in advancing our understanding of their module and derived categories. We give an overview of some of the theoretical advances that geometric surface models for the derived categories of graded gentle algebras and their connections to Fukaya categories of surfaces have made possible.

AI.tldr: 几何表面模型在表示论中的应用综述，特别是温和代数及其导出范畴与曲面Fukaya范畴的联系
AI.motivation: 几何模型已成为代数表示论中的重要工具，温和代数相关的表面模型特别有助于理解其模范畴和导出范畴
AI.method: 使用几何表面模型研究分级温和代数的导出范畴，并探讨其与曲面Fukaya范畴的联系
AI.result: 几何表面模型使得在温和代数的导出范畴理论方面取得了重要进展
AI.conclusion: 几何表面模型为理解温和代数的导出范畴及其与Fukaya范畴的联系提供了有力工具，推动了相关理论的发展

title: Tensor Abelian Geometry of VI-modules
summary: In this short note, we study the spectrum of prime Serre ideals of global representations for noetherian families. In particular, we prove that the spectrum of prime Serre ideals of finitely generated VI-modules is homeomorphic to N^{*}, the one-point compactification of N, which differs from the Balmer spectrum of derived VI-modules. Our method could also be applied to the category of finitely generated FI-modules and the category of global representations for the family of cyclic p-groups.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了诺特族全局表示的素Serre理想谱，证明了有限生成VI-模的素Serre理想谱与N的单点紧化N*同胚，这与导出VI-模的Balmer谱不同。
AI.motivation: 研究诺特族全局表示的素Serre理想谱结构，特别是比较有限生成VI-模的素Serre理想谱与导出VI-模的Balmer谱之间的差异。
AI.method: 通过分析诺特族全局表示的素Serre理想，建立有限生成VI-模的素Serre理想谱与N的单点紧化N*之间的同胚关系，并将方法推广到有限生成FI-模和循环p-群族的全局表示范畴。
AI.result: 证明了有限生成VI-模的素Serre理想谱与N*同胚，这与导出VI-模的Balmer谱不同；方法可应用于有限生成FI-模和循环p-群族的全局表示范畴。
AI.conclusion: 有限生成VI-模的素Serre理想谱具有与N*同胚的特殊结构，不同于导出VI-模的Balmer谱，这一结果可推广到其他相关范畴。

title: Weyl Mutations in Quiver Yangians
comment: 49 pages, 5 figures, v2: a conjecture for the non-simply laced case is added
summary: The problem of solving non-linear equations would be considerably simplified by a possibility to convert known solutions into the new ones. This could seem an element of art, but in the context of ADHM-like equations describing quiver varieties there is a systematic approach. In this note we study moduli spaces and dualities of quiver gauge theories associated to effective dynamics of D-branes compactified on Calabi-Yau resolutions. We concentrate on a subfamily of quivers $\mathfrak{Q}_{\mathfrak{g}}$ covering Dynkin diagrams for simple Lie algebras $\mathfrak{g}$, where the respective BPS algebra is expected to be the Yangian algebra $Y(\mathfrak{g})$. For Yangians labeled by quivers their representations are described by solutions of ADHM-like equations. As quivers substitute Dynkin diagrams a generalization of the Weyl group $\mathcal{W}_{\mathfrak{g}}$ acts on the ADHM solutions. Here we work with the case $\mathfrak{g}=\mathfrak{sl}_{n+1}$ and treat this group as a group of electro-magnetic Seiberg-like dualities (we call them Weyl mutations) on the respective quiver gauge theories. We lift it to the case of higher representations associated to rectangular Young diagrams. An action of Weyl mutations on the BPS Yangian algebra is also discussed.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了与D-膜在Calabi-Yau紧化上有效动力学相关的规范理论模空间和对偶性，重点关注覆盖简单李代数Dynkin图的子族，其中BPS代数预期为Yangian代数，并探讨了Weyl突变对ADHM解和Yangian代数的作用。
AI.motivation: 研究非线性方程求解问题，特别是如何将已知解转化为新解。在描述quiver簇的ADHM型方程背景下，存在系统方法。论文旨在探索与D-膜在Calabi-Yau紧化上有效动力学相关的quiver规范理论的模空间和对偶性。
AI.method: 集中研究覆盖简单李代数Dynkin图的quiver子族𝔔𝔤，其中BPS代数预期为Yangian代数Y(𝔤)。将Weyl群推广为电-磁Seiberg型对偶群（称为Weyl突变），作用于ADHM解。具体处理𝔤=𝔰𝔩ₙ₊₁情况，并将其提升到与矩形Young图相关的高维表示。
AI.result: 建立了Weyl突变对ADHM解的作用机制，将其视为quiver规范理论的电-磁Seiberg型对偶。将这一作用推广到与矩形Young图相关的高维表示，并讨论了Weyl突变对BPS Yangian代数的作用。
AI.conclusion: 通过研究quiver规范理论的模空间和对偶性，特别是Weyl突变的作用，为非线性方程求解提供了系统方法。这一框架将quiver替代Dynkin图，推广了Weyl群的作用，为理解Yangian代数的表示和ADHM型方程的对称性提供了新视角。

title: Analytic Langlands correspondence from SoV
comment: 21 pages; v2: Proof of Theorem 3 corrected and simplified
summary: The analytic Langlands correspondence proposed by Etingof, Frenkel and Kazhdan describes the solution to the spectral problems naturally arising in the quantisation of the Hitchin integrable systems in terms of real opers, certain second order differential operators on a Riemann surface having real monodromy. We prove this correspondence in the cases associated to the group $\mathrm{PSL}(2,\mathbb{C})$, and Riemann surfaces of genus zero with a number of punctures larger than three. A crucial ingredient is a unitary integral transformation mapping products of solutions to the ordinary differential equation associated to a real oper to eigenfunctions of the quantised Hitchin Hamiltonians. This allows us to construct joint eigenfunctions of Hecke operators and Hitchin Hamiltonians from real opers.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了与PSL(2,C)群相关的解析朗兰兹对应，针对亏格为零且穿孔数大于三的黎曼曲面，建立了实oper与量子化Hitchin系统谱问题解之间的对应关系。
AI.motivation: Etingof、Frenkel和Kazhdan提出的解析朗兰兹对应描述了量子化Hitchin可积系统的谱问题解与实oper之间的关系。本文旨在证明这一对应关系在特定情况下的有效性。
AI.method: 使用酉积分变换，将实oper相关的常微分方程解的乘积映射到量子化Hitchin哈密顿量的本征函数。通过这一变换，从实oper构造出Hecke算子和Hitchin哈密顿量的联合本征函数。
AI.result: 成功证明了与PSL(2,C)群相关的解析朗兰兹对应，针对亏格为零且穿孔数大于三的黎曼曲面。建立了实oper与量子化Hitchin系统谱问题解之间的精确对应关系。
AI.conclusion: 本文证明了Etingof-Frenkel-Kazhdan解析朗兰兹对应在PSL(2,C)群和亏格为零多穿孔黎曼曲面情况下的有效性，为理解量子化Hitchin可积系统的谱问题提供了重要工具。

title: Beyond endoscopy for $\mathsf{GL}_2$ over $\mathbb{Q}$ with ramification 1: Poisson summation
summary: At the beginning of this century, Langlands introduced a strategy known as \emph{Beyond Endoscopy} to attack the principle of functoriality. Altuğ studied $\mathsf{GL}_2$ over $\mathbb{Q}$ in the unramified setting. The first step involves isolating specific representations, especially the residual part of the spectral side, in the elliptic part of the geometric side of the trace formula. We generalize this step to the case with ramification at $S=\{\infty,q_1,\dots,q_r\}$ with $2\in S$, thereby fully resolving the problem of isolating these representations over $\mathbb{Q}$ which remained unresolved for over a decade. Such a formula that isolates the specific representations is derived by modifying Altuğ's approach. We use the approximate functional equation to ensure the validity of the Poisson summation formula. Then, we compute the residues of specific functions to isolate the desired representations.

AI.tldr: 本文推广了Altuğ在GL₂/Q无分歧情形下的Beyond Endoscopy方法，解决了在包含∞和有限素数的分歧集合S下隔离特定表示的问题，填补了十余年的研究空白。
AI.motivation: Langlands提出的Beyond Endoscopy策略旨在攻击函子性原理，但Altuğ仅在GL₂/Q的无分歧情形下进行了研究。对于包含分歧点（特别是包含2）的情形，如何隔离特定表示的问题十余年来一直未解决，本文旨在填补这一空白。
AI.method: 通过修改Altuğ的方法，使用近似函数方程确保Poisson求和公式的有效性，然后计算特定函数的留数以隔离目标表示。将方法推广到在S={∞,q₁,...,qᵣ}（其中2∈S）处有分歧的情形。
AI.result: 成功推导出在分歧集合S下隔离特定表示的公式，完全解决了GL₂/Q中这一十余年未解决的问题，为Beyond Endoscopy策略在分歧情形下的应用提供了关键工具。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功将Altuğ的Beyond Endoscopy方法推广到有分歧的情形，特别是解决了包含2的分歧集合下的表示隔离问题，为函子性原理的研究提供了新的技术手段。

title: Metric completions of triangulated categories from finite dimensional algebras
comment: 30 pages; v3: version to be included in the author's Ph.d. thesis
summary: In this paper, we study metric completions of triangulated categories in a representation-theoretic context. We provide a concrete description of completions of bounded derived categories of hereditary finite dimensional algebras of finite representation type. In order to investigate completions of bounded derived categories of algebras of finite global dimension, we define image and preimage metrics under a triangulated functor and use them to induce a triangulated equivalence between two completions. Furthermore, for a given metric on a triangulated category we construct a new, closely related good metric called the improvement and compare the respective completions.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了三角范畴的度量完备化，在表示论背景下提供了遗传有限维代数的有界导出范畴完备化的具体描述，并定义了三角函子下的度量构造方法。
AI.motivation: 研究三角范畴的度量完备化在表示论中的应用，特别是针对有限表示型遗传代数的有界导出范畴，以及更一般的有限整体维数代数的完备化问题。
AI.method: 1. 为有限表示型遗传有限维代数的有界导出范畴提供具体的完备化描述；2. 定义三角函子下的像度量和原像度量，用于诱导两个完备化之间的三角等价；3. 构造与给定度量密切相关的新"改进"度量，并比较相应的完备化。
AI.result: 获得了有限表示型遗传代数的有界导出范畴完备化的具体描述，建立了三角函子下度量诱导完备化等价的方法，并提出了度量改进技术来研究完备化之间的关系。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为三角范畴的度量完备化提供了系统的理论框架，特别在表示论背景下建立了具体计算方法，为研究代数导出范畴的完备结构提供了新工具。

title: Quantum Harish-Chandra isomorphism for the double affine Hecke algebra of $GL_n$

summary: We prove that for generic parameters, the quantum radial parts map of Varagnolo and Vasserot gives an isomorphism between the spherical double affine Hecke algebra of $GL_n$ and a quantized multiplicative quiver variety, as defined by Jordan.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了在一般参数下，Varagnolo和Vasserot的量子径向部分映射给出了GL_n的球面双仿射Hecke代数与Jordan定义的量子化乘法箭图簇之间的同构。
AI.motivation: 研究球面双仿射Hecke代数与量子化乘法箭图簇之间的关系，建立这两个重要数学结构之间的精确对应，深化对表示理论和几何表示论的理解。
AI.method: 使用Varagnolo和Vasserot提出的量子径向部分映射，在一般参数条件下证明该映射是球面双仿射Hecke代数与量子化乘法箭图簇之间的同构。
AI.result: 证明了在一般参数下，量子径向部分映射确实给出了GL_n的球面双仿射Hecke代数与量子化乘法箭图簇之间的同构关系。
AI.conclusion: 该结果建立了表示理论中两个重要代数结构之间的深刻联系，为理解球面双仿射Hecke代数的几何实现提供了新的视角。

title: Positroid Links and Braid varieties
summary: We study braid varieties and their relation to open positroid varieties. We discuss four different types of braids associated to open positroid strata and show that their associated Legendrian links are all Legendrian isotopic. In particular, we prove that each open positroid stratum can be presented as the augmentation variety for four different Legendrian fronts described in terms of either permutations, juggling patterns, cyclic rank matrices or Le diagrams. We also relate braid varieties to open Richardson varieties and brick manifolds, showing that the latter provide projective compactifications of braid varieties, with normal crossing divisors at infinity.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了辫子簇与开正位簇的关系，证明了四种不同辫子类型对应的勒让德链环都是勒让德同痕的，并建立了开正位簇与四种勒让德前缘的增广簇表示之间的等价性。
AI.motivation: 研究辫子簇与开正位簇之间的深层联系，探索不同辫子表示之间的等价性，以及这些代数簇与勒让德链环的几何对应关系。
AI.method: 通过分析四种不同类型的辫子（与排列、杂耍模式、循环秩矩阵和Le图相关），证明它们对应的勒让德链环都是勒让德同痕的。将开正位簇表示为四种不同勒让德前缘的增广簇，并将辫子簇与开理查森簇和砖流形联系起来。
AI.result: 证明了每个开正位层都可以用四种不同的勒让德前缘（基于排列、杂耍模式、循环秩矩阵或Le图）的增广簇来表示。建立了辫子簇与开理查森簇的关系，并证明砖流形为辫子簇提供了射影紧化，且在无穷远处具有正规交叉除子。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了辫子簇、开正位簇、勒让德链环和增广簇之间的统一框架，揭示了不同数学对象之间的深刻联系，并为辫子簇提供了自然的射影紧化。

title: Jacobson-Morozov Lemma for Algebraic Supergroups
summary:
Given a quasi-reductive algebraic supergroup $G$, we use the theory of semisimplifications of symmetric monoidal categories to define a symmetric monoidal functor $Φ_x: Rep(G) \to Rep(OSp(1|2))$ associated to any given element $x \in \mathrm{Lie}(G)_{\bar 1}$. For nilpotent elements $x$, we show that the functor $Φ_x$ can be defined using the Deligne filtration associated to $x$.
  We use this approach to prove an analogue of the Jacobson-Morozov Lemma for algebraic supergroups. Namely, we give a necessary and sufficient condition on odd nilpotent elements $x\in \mathrm{Lie}(G)_{\bar 1}$ which define an embedding of supergroups $OSp(1|2)\to G$ so that $x$ lies in the image of the corresponding Lie algebra homomorphism.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了代数超群中的奇幂零元素，利用对称幺半范畴的半单化理论构造了从超群表示范畴到OSp(1|2)表示范畴的函子，并证明了超群版本的Jacobson-Morozov引理。
AI.motivation: 研究代数超群中奇幂零元素的性质，特别是如何将奇幂零元素与超群OSp(1|2)的嵌入联系起来，这是经典李代数理论中Jacobson-Morozov引理在超群情形下的推广。
AI.method: 使用对称幺半范畴的半单化理论，为任意元素x∈Lie(G)₁构造对称幺半函子Φ_x: Rep(G)→Rep(OSp(1|2))。对于幂零元素x，利用与x相关的Deligne滤过来定义该函子。
AI.result: 证明了代数超群的Jacobson-Morozov引理类比：给出了奇幂零元素x∈Lie(G)₁定义超群嵌入OSp(1|2)→G的充要条件，使得x位于相应李代数同态的像中。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了代数超群中奇幂零元素与OSp(1|2)嵌入之间的深刻联系，为超群表示论提供了新的工具和视角，推广了经典李代数理论中的重要结果。
